text: int main ( ) { int t , i ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < t ; i ++ ) { int n , j ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ n ] , b [ n ] ; for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ j ] ) ; int k = 0 , s = 0 ; while ( k < ( n - 1 ) ) { if ( a [ k ] < a [ k + 1 ] ) { a [ k + 1 ] = a [ k ] ; s = s + a [ k ] ; } else { s = s + a [ k + 1 ] ; } k ++ ; } printf ( "%d\n" , s ) ; } return 0 ; }
